---
title: "Taxa de Reposição de Servidores"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: scroll
    theme: bootstrap
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(scales)

dados <- readr::read_csv2("data-raw/taxa.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  dplyr::mutate(reposicao = ingressos/saidas, ano = as.factor(ano)) 


```

Row {data-height=200, data-width=350}
-------------------------------------
###

```{r fig.width=2, fig.height=5}

p <- dados |> 
  ggplot2::ggplot() +
  ggplot2::aes(x = ano , y = reposicao) +
  ggplot2::geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "#112446") +
  ggplot2::geom_text(
    ggplot2::aes(
      y = reposicao + 0.05,
      label = scales::percent(reposicao) 
    ),
    vjust = -0.8,
    position = ggplot2::position_dodge(width = 1), 
    size = 3
  ) +
  ggplot2::xlab("")  +
  ggplot2::ylab("") +
  ggplot2::ggtitle(label = "Taxa de Reposição de Servidores") +
  ggplot2::scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent)+
  ggplot2::theme_minimal(base_size = 8)

plotly::ggplotly(p)

```

Row {data-height=100,  data-width=350}
-------------------------------------
###

```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=5 }
library(echarts4r)
e1 <- dados |> 
  e_charts(
    ano,
    height = 200,
    elementId = "chart1" # specify id
  ) |> 
  e_bar(ingressos, name = "Ingressos") |> 
  e_bar(saidas, name = "Saídas") |>  
  #e_datazoom(show = FALSE) |>  # hide
  echarts4r::e_legend(right = 0) |>
  
  echarts4r::e_theme("auritus" ) |>
  echarts4r::e_tooltip(trigger = "axis")

  
e2 <- dados |> 
  e_charts(
    ano,
    height = 180
  ) |> 
  e_line(reposicao) |> 
  e_y_axis(formatter = e_axis_formatter(style = "percent", digits = 1)) |> 
  #e_datazoom() |>
  echarts4r::e_title("Taxa de reposição", "Poder Executivo Federal") |>
  echarts4r::e_legend(right = 0) |>
  echarts4r::e_theme("auritus" ) |>
  echarts4r::e_tooltip(trigger = "axis") 
  
e_arrange(e2, e1)
```

```{r}
dados |> 
  e_charts(ano) |> 
  e_bar(ingressos, name = "Ingressos") |> 
  e_bar(saidas, name = "Saídas") |> 
  e_step(reposicao, name = "Taxa de Reposição") |> 
  e_title("Poder Executivo Federal") 
```
